items.name: BLOCK
desc: The text extends from the left to the right edge of the shape.
The text extends from the top to the bottom edge of the shape.

items.name: BOTTOM
desc: the connection line leaves the connected object from the bottom,
The text is positioned below the main line.
The bottom edge of the text is adjusted to the bottom edge of the shape.

items.name: CENTER
desc: The text is centered inside the shape.

items.name: TOP
desc: the connection line leaves the connected object from the top,
The text is positioned above the main line.
The top edge of the text is adjusted to the top edge of the shape.
